Cheryl N

messages.subject: Florida unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: I m looking for a new evaluator for next year.  I don t think our current evaluator is pro unschooling.  She s okay with relaxed homeschooling but I m
messages.messageBody: I'm looking for a new evaluator for next year. I don't think our current evaluator is pro unschooling. She's okay with "relaxed homeschooling" but I'm getting some vibes that say she may expect things as they get older that we are not going to make our kids do and they may or may not choose to do. I know there are a few others on the list who live in Florida. If you have pro unschooling evaluators, I'd love to hook up with them. Feel free to email me off the list since this really may not interest all the other folks. Thanks. ambersand
